text: This chapter modifies, limits, or supersedes the federal Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act, approved June 30, 2000 (114 Stat. 464; 15 U.S.C. § 7001 et seq.), but this chapter does not modify, limit, or supersede section 101(c) of that act or authorize electronic delivery of any of the notices described in section 103(b) of that act.
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 16-87, see notes following § 16-4201.

Uniform Law

This section is based upon § 12 of the Uniform Mediation Act. See 7A, Pt. II, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE § 16-4211

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Particular Actions, Proceedings and Matters. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Relation to Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act.
